name: Turbo USD
description: tUSD is a yield-bearing stablecoin on Eclipse that earns yield from short-term U.S. Treasury Bills. It aggregates returns from Centrifuge’s JTRSY, Superstate’s USTB, and M^0, offering users a stable, appreciating asset backed by real-world treasuries. Users can now earn U.S. Treasury Bill Yield on a stablecoin natively on Eclipse through tUSD. tUSD is equally backed (33.3% each) by: Centrifuge's JTRSY: A tokenized fund investing in short-term U.S. Treasury Bills. Superstate's USTB: A fund focusing on short-duration U.S. Treasury Bills. M^0: Infrastructure that powers builders of safe, programmable, interoperable stablecoins with U.S. Treasury Bills as collateral.
